name: SMSFAX: Send SMS to mobiles (PHP Script)
short_description: A free (LGPL) PHP Script to send SMS easily to mobile phones worldwide and check their successful transmission from any Web site or computer application. Use the MCTEL SMSFAX Gateway (http://www.smsfax.com) for SMS transmission.
